findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized upgrade of its script.

findings.title: antiBot vulnerability in transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function has an antiBot vulnerability.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in setTradingStatus function
findings.description: The smart contract owner has the ability to change trading status, which can lead to potential resource exhaustion errors and elevated risk of out-of-gas.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in excludeFromReward function
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function has an onlyOwner vulnerability.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in includeInReward function
findings.description: The includeInReward function has an onlyOwner vulnerability.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in excludeFromFee function
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function has an onlyOwner vulnerability.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in includeInFee function
findings.description: The includeInFee function has an onlyOwner vulnerability.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in setTaxes function
findings.description: The setTaxes function has an onlyOwner vulnerability, allowing the contract owner to change transaction fees without any arbitrary limit.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in setSellTaxes function
findings.description: The setSellTaxes function has an onlyOwner access modifier, which may lead to unauthorized access or privilege escalation.
